SELECT PRO.PROVINCE_ID, PRO.PROVINCE_NAME, CI.CITY_ID, CI.CITY_NAME, AR.AREA_ID, AR.AREA_CODE, AR.AREA_NAME FROM TB_PROVINCE PRO LEFT JOIN TB_CITY CI ON PRO.PROVINCE_ID = CI.PROVINCE_ID LEFT JOIN TB_AREA_INFO AR ON CI.CITY_ID = AR.CITY_ID
AND PRO.PROVINCE_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{provinceName,jdbcType = VARCHAR},'%')
AND CI.CITY_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{cityName,jdbcType = VARCHAR},'%')
AND AR.AREA_CODE = #{areaCode,jdbcType = VARCHAR}
AND AR.AREA_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{areaName,jdbcType = VARCHAR},'%')
ORDER BY PRO.PROVINCE_ID
SELECT P.PROVINCE_ID, P.PROVINCE_NAME FROM TB_PROVINCE P
SELECT P.PROVINCE_ID, P.PROVINCE_NAME FROM tb_sp_province P
SELECT C.CITY_ID, C.CITY_NAME FROM TB_CITY C WHERE C.PROVINCE_ID = #{provinceId,jdbcType = VARCHAR}
SELECT C.CITY_ID, C.CITY_NAME FROM tb_sp_city C WHERE C.PROVINCE_ID = #{provinceId,jdbcType = VARCHAR}
SELECT A.AREA_ID, A.AREA_NAME FROM TB_AREA_INFO A WHERE A.CITY_ID = #{cityId,jdbcType = VARCHAR}
SELECT A.AREA_ID, A.AREA_NAME FROM tb_sp_area A WHERE A.CITY_ID = #{cityId,jdbcType = VARCHAR}

SELECT P.PROVINCE_ID, P.PROVINCE_NAME, C.CITY_ID, C.CITY_NAME, A.AREA_ID, A.AREA_NAME FROM TB_AREA_INFO A, TB_CITY C, TB_PROVINCE P WHERE A.CITY_ID = C.CITY_ID AND C.PROVINCE_ID = P.PROVINCE_ID AND A.AREA_ID = #{areaId,jdbcType = VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_PROVINCE ( PROVINCE_ID, PROVINCE_NAME ) SELECT MAX(P.PROVINCE_ID) + 1, #{provinceName, jdbcType = VARCHAR} FROM TB_PROVINCE P
INSERT INTO TB_CITY ( CITY_ID, CITY_NAME, PROVINCE_ID ) SELECT MAX(C.CITY_ID)+1, #{cityName, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{provinceId, jdbcType = INTEGER} FROM TB_CITY C

INSERT INTO TB_AREA_INFO ( AREA_ID, AREA_CODE, AREA_LEVEL, AREA_NAME, CITY_ID, PROVINCE_ID )SELECT MAX(T.AREA_ID)+1, #{areaCode, jdbcType = INTEGER}, #{areaLevel, jdbcType = INTEGER}, #{areaName, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{cityId, jdbcType = INTEGER}, #{provinceId, jdbcType = INTEGER} FROM TB_AREA_INFO T
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM TB_PROVINCE WHERE PROVINCE_ID = #{provinceId,jdbcType = VARCHAR}
DELETE FROM TB_CITY WHERE CITY_ID = #{cityId,jdbcType = VARCHAR}
DELETE FROM TB_AREA_INFO WHERE AREA_ID = #{areaId,jdbcType = VARCHAR}

SELECT t.province_id, t.province_name FROM tb_sp_province t
